title: CHAMP SELECT DOESN'T POP UP WHEN YOUR SELECTING A CHAMP
body: Come on. In my series and im in champ select. Previously when it was your turn to pick a champion or ban the Client would pop up on your screen and alert you with a sound, countless times i have lost a series or accidentally dodged a game due to this un- announced change. please revert this as we have better things to do than stare at our champ select screens.

replies.body: thats what 2 screens are for lmao

I strongly agree, you might aswell make the "MATCH FOUND" not pop on your screen either, if you're going to make it so that we can't see when it's our time to ban/pick since 99% of us are AFK on youtube or something cause we don't want to watch  boring ban's and picks every single god damn game, we are used of the old que's i have lost several promos,
